msg: Created a branch for working on immutable node structures. It is not yet clear how this works out. During integration with existing code, the build is going to fail for a while. Therefore, it makes sense to do this on a separate branch.

author: oheger
msg: In future we are going to support different types of hierarchical configuration
nodes. The purpose of the NodeHanlder interface is allowing (read-only) access
to the data of a specific node type.
